item.title: Anti Artificial Spam v0.2 Released
item.author: 作者
item.description: Change Log 2011-02-23 Wednesday 22:24:12 Rename anti-manpower-spam to anti-artificial-spam. Don't just test if the URL is in the banned ones, but also test if it is a substring of one of them. Optimize the speed of matching. Check the plugin’s page for more information.
